article.Heading: Here are some investing picks from market experts
article.Summary: Watch the interview of Sudarshan Sukhani, Ashwani Gujral and Mitessh Thakkar with Anuj Singhal, Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18.
article.Body: Watch the interview of Ashwani Gujral of ashwanigujral.com, Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com and Mitessh Thakkar of miteshthacker.com with Anuj Singhal, Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18, in which they shared their readings and outlook on market technicals as well as specific stocks and sectors.
